rooms.name: Garage Entrance Area

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious, minimalist living area with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the room towards the northeast.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern, open kitchen integrated into the living space with ample natural light from south-facing windows and efficient ventilation. Vastu-aligned for prosperity.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, this area is designed for dining with light accents and natural ventilation. Vastu recommendations include placement towards the east.

rooms.name: Multipurpose Room/Studio
rooms.description: A flexible studio space that can serve as a home office or guest area, designed with natural light and ventilation in mind. Vastu suggests placement towards the west for creativity.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area that sets the tone with minimalist design and ample space, ensuring smooth transition from outdoor to indoor.
